term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - peak resolution, R_s, in chromatography
term.title: peak resolution

item.text: The separation of two peaks in terms of their average peak width at base (t R2 > t R1): R s = t R2- t R1 w b1 + w b2 2 , and thus, the width of the second peak may be substituted for the average value:

item.alttext: R s = t R2- t R1 w b1 + w b2 2
R s ≈ t R2- t R1 w b2

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 819. 'Nomenclature for chromatography (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 847 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365040819)
